name: Colorful Messenger (Absolute Monstrosity)
description:
First Game Jam Ever ended horribly but Was fun to dive in to 2d for the first time 

E interact wasd arrow keys to move choose right app to gain coins no use for coins but bragging rights because time is an independent variable while this game is dependent

Nevermind- key part of game won't work ignore E and just move around

Great Idea- Bad execution 

More than I can chew

FIRST 2D GAME I'VE EVER MADE
